text:
Hello, We have an installation of tomcat 4.1.24 on RedHat 9.0 box with the
followings charateristics:
CPU: AMD Duron 800Mhz.
RAM: 512Mb

We have 3 WAR installed on this machine running apparently well, but after some
time, application server stops responding (doesn't send page to client broswer).
Tomcat continues running and not error messages appear in logs.

The client browser waits for answers about hours and hours....
Any idea?

If you need more information, let me know please.

greetings, 
Nicolas Orbes
norbes@adinet.com.uy
creator: norbes@adinet.com.uy
funkman@joedog.org
text: Please use the tomcat-user list to debug problems.

Thank you Tim... we'll find some help in the user list, looking for an apropiate
answer. After that if the problem persist, I hope you can help us.

Regards
Nicolas Orbes
creator: norbes@adinet.com.uy
